lines: THERE IS A PLACE OF QUIET REST
Kuli munzi wa lumuno, Ku cuno ca Leza,
U ko cibi tacijanwi kucuno ca Leza.
O Jesu Mufutuli, O zwa kuli Leza,
Cilawo ca kulyokezya ku cuno ca Leza,
Nkotuya kuswana a Mwami, Ku cuno ca Leza.
Ku munzi wa lwanguluko, ku cuno ca Leza,
Oko kuli kukomana, ku cuno ca Leza.
